sql.query:
SELECT salt AS saltvalue, user_tpin, id, md_id, ds_id
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND u_status = '1' AND blank2 = :P1 /* {{$_GET.username}} */

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countmdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.md_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.ds_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT tt_recharge_trans.user_number, tt_recharge_trans.opening_balance, tt_recharge_trans.amount, tt_recharge_trans.net_amt, tt_recharge_trans.closing_balance, tt_recharge_trans.status, tt_recharge_trans.id, tt_recharge_trans.tr_date, tt_recharge_trans.comm_amt, tt_recharge_trans.charge_amt, tt_recharge_trans.tr_type, tt_recharge_trans.reason, tt_recharge_trans.tr_id, tt_recharge_trans.api_ref, m_op.operator_name, m_service.service_name, m_op.image
FROM tt_recharge_trans
LEFT JOIN m_operator AS m_op ON (m_op.id = tt_recharge_trans.op_id) LEFT JOIN m_service AS m_service ON (m_service.id = tt_recharge_trans.service_id)
WHERE tt_recharge_trans.user_id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */ AND tt_recharge_trans.user_number = :P2 /* {{$_GET.inpsearch}} */
ORDER BY tt_recharge_trans.id DESC

SELECT tt_recharge_trans.user_number, tt_recharge_trans.opening_balance, tt_recharge_trans.amount, tt_recharge_trans.net_amt, tt_recharge_trans.closing_balance, tt_recharge_trans.status, tt_recharge_trans.id, tt_recharge_trans.tr_date, tt_recharge_trans.comm_amt, tt_recharge_trans.charge_amt, tt_recharge_trans.tr_type, tt_recharge_trans.reason, m_op.operator_name, m_service.service_name, tt_recharge_trans.tr_id, m_op.image
FROM tt_recharge_trans
LEFT JOIN m_operator AS m_op ON (m_op.id = tt_recharge_trans.op_id) LEFT JOIN m_service AS m_service ON (m_service.id = tt_recharge_trans.service_id)
WHERE tt_recharge_trans.user_id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */ AND tt_recharge_trans.id = :P2 /* {{$_GET.inpsearch}} */
ORDER BY tt_recharge_trans.id DESC
